document_data.name: Thelgul
document_data.mainbody: '''Thelgul''' was an author on or before the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By {{yearlink|1373}}, Thelgul's work ''[[Do Metals Live?]]'' was amongst the works in [[Candlekeep]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: In 1373, [[Noumea Cardellith]], pretending to be a merchant from [[Lantan]], claimed to be interested in Thelgul's ''Do Metals Live?'' when seeking admittance in Candlekeep.
